description:
Yusuke must begin to cope with the loss of his best friend at the hands of Toguro. Meanwhile, after Sakyo asks Koenma to take his life, the billionaire unveils his final plan: destroying the stadium with everyone still inside!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tougijou to Tomo ni Kieru Yabou
闘技場と共に消える野望
